title.en: A Prayer to the Wisdom Ḍākinīs

text.en: Within the wisdom-space of the Vajra Queen, the dharmadhātu,
text.en-trans: chöying dorjé tsünmö yeshe ying

text.en: From garlands of clouds of the bliss-empty magical net,
text.en-trans: detong gyutrul drawé trin treng lé

text.en: Your lightning dance of blessings, siddhis, and activities
text.en-trans: jinlab ngödrub trinlé lok gar gyi

text.en: Showers us with goodness and happiness—to you ḍākinīs I pray!
text.en-trans: pendé charbeb khandror solwa deb

text.en: As Gaṅgādevī in the presence of the Sage,1
text.en-trans: tubpé chen ngar gang gé lhamö tsul

text.en: And Sarasvatī, vajra speech of all buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyal kün sung gi dorjé yangchenma

text.en: Delighting your Guru, you compiled the Secret Mantra’s teachings.
text.en-trans: gurü gyé dé sang ngak ka dümo

text.en: Lady Yeshé Tsogyal, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: yeshe tsogyal zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Swift One—activity of all the buddhas—
text.en-trans: sangye kün gyi trinlé nyurmé tsul

text.en: Renowned heroine—liberator of the hard-to-tame—2
text.en-trans: dul ké dro kün drolwa pamö tsen

text.en: Mother of all Victors, Umbrella3over existence and peace,
text.en-trans: sizhi dung kyob gyalwa kün yum ma

text.en: Noble Lady Tārā, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: jetsün pakma drolmar solwa deb

text.en: You are Samantabhadrī, mother of space, perfection of the three doors of liberation,
text.en-trans: namtar sum dzok ying yum kunzang mo

text.en: The five great mothers of the five wisdom expanses and five families,
text.en-trans: yeshe long nga rik kyi yumchen nga

text.en: And Krodhikālī, empress of the ḍākinīs of the three abodes,
text.en-trans: né sum khandrö jemo tröma nak

text.en: Dhātviśvarī Vajravārāhī, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: yingchuk dorjé pakmor solwa deb

text.en: Your vajra-form of great bliss, utterly unchanging,
text.en-trans: chok tu mingyur dechen dorjé zuk

text.en: Takes the guise of Nateśvara’s consort, lady of pleasure,
text.en-trans: gar gyi wangchuk gyé mé yum gyi tsul

text.en: Queen of Siddhis, chief amongst Uḍḍiyāna’s ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: orgyen daki tsomor ngödrub dak

text.en: Lady Guhyajñānā, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sangwa yeshe zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Ḍākinī—single essence with myriad displays,
text.en-trans: ngö chikdumé rolpé dhakima

text.en: Ultimate, co-emergent wisdom-space,
text.en-trans: döndam lhenchik kyé mé yeshe ying

text.en: Vast, pervasive equality permeating all of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa—
text.en-trans: khordé künkhyab nyam yang dalwa ché

text.en: Never parting from this essence, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: ngowor dudral mepé solwa deb

text.en: By purifying our minds through the path of renunciation and weariness,
text.en-trans: ngejung kyoshé lam gyi gyü jang né

text.en: Through faith, devotion and diligence, may we perfect the awakened conduct.
text.en-trans: dé mö tsönpé changchub chöpa dzok

text.en: Especially, through the profound, direct path of ripening and liberation,
text.en-trans: khyepar mindrol zabmö seng lam gyi

text.en: May we enjoy the vajra citadel of unified great bliss!
text.en-trans: zungjuk dechen dorjé drong tsen shok

text.en: Perfecting the three conducts, the immediate cause,4
text.en-trans: chöpa sum gyi nyé gyu tarsönpé

text.en: May I bind the three blazes of the prāṇa-mind in the central channel,5
text.en-trans: barwa sum gyi lungsem umar ching

text.en: And through three gatherings may the two benefits be spontaneously accomplished.6
text.en-trans: duwa sum gyi dön nyi lhündrub né

text.en: Thus may I gain the same fortune as the ḍākinīs of the three places.
text.en-trans: né sum khandrö tsok dang kal nyam shok

text.en: In all my future lives, O wisdom ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: tsewé küntu yeshe khandromé

text.en: Take me under your care! Through the supreme Vajrayāna,
text.en-trans: jesu zung té dorjé tek chok gyi

text.en: The innate, secret treasury that yields all to be desired,
text.en-trans: sangdzö dögur chöpa lhenkyé kyi

text.en: May I awaken, merging indivisibly with the wisdom bindu!
text.en-trans: yeshe tikler nyimé changchub shok
